      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030704</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los Líquenes</string>
            <string language="en">Lichens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flechten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lichens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lichens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Licheni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λειχήνες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se explica la definición de liquen, su clasificación, atendiendo al lugar donde viven, y su utilidad. Además se explica el concepto de simbiosis.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the definition of lichen, its classification depending on where it lives and its use. There is also an explanation of the concept of symbiosis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Líquenes</string>
            <string language="en">Lichens</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die Definition der Flechte, seine 
Klassifikation erklärt abhängig von, der sie und sein Gebrauch lebt.
Es gibt auch eine Erklärung des Konzeptes der Symbiose.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant la définition du lichen, sa 
classification selon où elle vit et son utilisation. Il y a 
également une explication du concept de la symbiose.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica a definição do lichen, sua 
classificação dependendo de onde vive e seu uso. Há também 
uma explanação do conceito do symbiosis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega la definizione del lichene, la
relativa classificazione secondo dove vive ed il relativo uso. 
Ci è egualmente una spiegazione del concetto di simbiosi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τον καθορισμό της λειχήνας, η 
ταξινόμησή του ανάλογα με όπου ζει και η χρήση της. 
Υπάρχει επίσης μια εξήγηση της έννοιας της συμβίωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flechten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lichens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
